Architecture: amd64 arm64 armel ia64 m68k mips64el mipsel ppc64el riscv64 all
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 12), cmake (>= 3.10), quilt, libboost-system-dev, libboost-date-time-dev, libboost-test-dev, libboost-iostreams-dev, gfortran, libtinyxml-dev, bc, zlib1g-dev, libtool, libopm-grid-dev (>= 2023.04), doxygen, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, ghostscript, pkg-config, mpi-default-dev, mpi-default-bin
Package-List: libopm-upscaling deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64 libopm-upscaling-bin deb science optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64 libopm-upscaling-dev deb libdevel optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64 libopm-upscaling-doc deb doc optional arch=all
